hero.title: Strategic Technology Leader
hero.subtitle: Driving Growth Through AI and Digital Transformation | 20+ Years of Innovation Leadership

about.description: Visionary AI/ML Leader and Transformation Strategist driving innovation and delivering impactful results for Fortune 500 companies. Skilled in building high-performing teams, creating innovative solutions, and turning complex technical concepts into business strategies. Expert in Generative AI, cloud transformation, and data-driven decision-making, generating new revenue, boosting efficiency, and reducing costs.

philosophy.title: Professional Philosophy
philosophy.content: I believe in leveraging cutting-edge technology to drive tangible business outcomes and foster innovation. My approach combines strategic vision with technical expertise to deliver transformative solutions that create lasting value and competitive advantage.
